data.name: Unoffensible
data.detailed_description:
In Unoffensible you will physically move your (defensive) structures to defeat a much stronger enemy army. The physics based interactions allow you to play the game in a style that suits you with as much freedom as possible. Every mission has the potential to unlock new weapons and features, but sometimes you will need to look for them. You can also find and mine resources to increase your chances of winning in the long run.

The playtest is open to most people, clicking the request access button will directly give you free access to the development build. Currently there is also a Demo, which is the same version as the playtest. Any feedback is appreciated on the community hub. (the playtest has its own community hub)



You will tower over the battle field like a giant and keep a cool head while your forces do battle. Weaken the enemy with a long concentrated defense, quickly takedown an enemy base to remove some pressure or have a small group mining resources while barely surviving the attack... the choice is yours.

The VR-only interactions are intuitive so you can be placed directly into the action when you start a new campaign.
data.about_the_game:

The physics based interactions allow you to play the game in a style that suits you with as much freedom as possible. data.short_description: Towering over the battlefield you will physically interact with everything. You will have full freedom to slowly buildup a powerful army or quickly strike the enemy at a weak point. Unlock upgrades and discover new allies. RTS like this is impossible without VR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: tested specs

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
